com.wit.and.widget.adapter.view

Interface StateView.OnStateViewVisibilityListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SelectableItem
    Enclosing class:
    StateView

    public static interface StateView.OnStateViewVisibilityListener

    public static interface

    OnStateViewVisibilityListener

    Interface Overview

    Interface to handle callback when the state view visibility was changed.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onVisibilityChanged(android.view.View stateView, int visibility)

    • Method Detail

      • onVisibilityChanged

        void onVisibilityChanged(android.view.View stateView,
                       int visibility)

        public void onVisibilityChanged(View stateView, int visibility)

        Invoked from the state view when its (see View . onVisibilityChanged() description) visibility was changed.

        Parameters:
        stateView - This isn't necessary the IStateView child.
        visibility - Actual visibility of the passed view.
